resources.string: If it is your first time SIGN UP
You have no more lives. Answer this question \n or you will go \n back to Level 1 \…
HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY
Headmaster: Albus Dumbledore\n (Order of Merlin, First Class, Grand Sorc., Chf.Warlock, Supreme Mugwump, International Confed. of Wizards)

We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

 Please tap to continue.

 Your sincerely,
